    • Uses of EvaluationContext in org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.pipe

      Subclasses of EvaluationContext in org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.pipe 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CollectorEvaluationContext<T extends Serializable>
      This implementation of the EvaluationContext binds to a Flink Collector, so all collected GenericEvents are automatically in the output stream of Flink.
      class  SimpleEvaluationContext<T extends Serializable>
      Implementation of the EvaluationContext in a simple manner
      Methods in org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.pipe with parameters of type EvaluationContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void EvaluationFunction.eval(EvaluationContext<T> ctx)
      evaluates the incoming TypedValues from the EvaluationContext and passes the results back to the collect method of the context
      void LambdaEvaluationFunction.eval(EvaluationContext<T> ctx)
      evaluates the incoming TypedValues from the EvaluationContext and passes the results back to the collect method of the context

      Main constructor that takes lambdas for the inner processing.

    • Uses of EvaluationContext in org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.state

      Subclasses of EvaluationContext in org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.state 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StateEvaluationContext<T extends Serializable>
      This is a special EvaluationContext implementation to be used inside a MultiStepEvaluationFunction, to separate it from the outer of MultiStepEvaluationFunction context.
      Methods in org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.state with parameters of type EvaluationContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MultiStepEvaluationFunction.eval(EvaluationContext context)
      evaluates the incoming TypedValues from the EvaluationContext and passes the results back to the collect method of the context
      void EvaluationCompleteExtractor.process(Map<String,T> events, EvaluationContext<T> context)
      If all states of the MultiStepEvaluationFunction are done, this method is called.
      void ErrorExtractor.process(Map<String,T> events, Exception ex, EvaluationContext<T> context)
      If any states of the MultiStepEvaluationFunction produce an Exception or a timeout exception is raised, this method is called.
